about_the_game:
🚀 Unleash the Future: Robo Tennis 🎮

Description:

Dive into the fast-paced world of Robo Tennis!

Face off against elite robots from top constructors in adrenaline-pumping tournaments. Earn credits, unlock advanced tech, and build the ultimate robot athlete. Customize your robot’s attributes for peak performance and dominate the pitch!

Features:

  • Unlock New Technologies: Spend your winnings on cutting-edge parts, upgrades, and special shots to enhance your robot’s abilities.

  • Build Your Ultimate Robot: Choose from a variety of components and special shots at your factory HQ to assemble a winning machine.

  • Secure Sponsorships: Win matches to attract sponsors, earn cash, and deck out your robot in their colors.

  • Acquire Trophies: Prove your prowess by winning major tournaments and earning trophies for your office. But beware—losing big games means losing those precious trophies!

Join the revolution and become the ultimate robo-champion! ⚙️🏆

name: Robo Tennis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64-bit
  • Storage: 460 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64-bit
  • Storage: 460 MB available space

short_description: Engage in single-player robot action by outsmarting your opponents on the court! Invest in advanced technology and craft your ultimate robot to achieve victory.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
